channel.title: CVE Feed for GitLab -- GitLab CE/EE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GitLab -- GitLab CE/EE

item.title: CVE-2019-15578|2024-08-05T00:49:13.672Z -- gitlab -- gitlab%20ce%2Fee
item.description: An information disclosure exists in < 12.3.2, < 12.2.6, and < 12.1.12 for GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE). The path of a private project, that used to be public, would be disclosed in the unsubscribe email link of issues and merge requests.

item.title: CVE-2019-15586|2024-08-05T00:49:13.628Z -- gitlab -- gitlab%20ce%2Fee
item.description: A XSS exists in Gitlab CE/EE < 12.1.10 in the Mermaid plugin.

item.title: CVE-2019-15579|2024-08-05T00:49:13.633Z -- gitlab -- gitlab%20ce%2Fee
item.description: An information disclosure exists in < 12.3.2, < 12.2.6, and < 12.1.12 for GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) where the assignee(s) of a confidential issue in a private project would be disclosed to a guest via milestones.

item.title: CVE-2019-15585|2024-08-05T00:49:13.654Z -- gitlab -- gitlab%20ce%2Fee
item.description: Improper authentication exists in < 12.3.2, < 12.2.6, and < 12.1.12 for GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE) in the GitLab SAML integration had a validation issue that permitted an attacker to takeover another user's account.

item.title: CVE-2019-15583|2024-08-05T00:49:13.753Z -- gitlab -- gitlab%20ce%2Fee
item.description: An information disclosure exists in < 12.3.2, < 12.2.6, and < 12.1.12 for GitLab Community Edition (CE) and Enterprise Edition (EE). When an issue was moved to a public project from a private one, the associated private labels and the private project namespace would be disclosed through the GitLab API.
